thread.title: Dennis Jones

author: Dennis Jones
title: Dennis Jones
text: I have to wear a Juxta-lite wrap on my left leg to control swelling and related skin tears. I have found through time that the leg covers provide a very real benefit, keeping the wrap's velcro from catching on clothing, furniture, etc. Both items are available at Lymphedema, and their prices are very reasonable. I received my package within a week of ordering, which is very fast in our northern winters, with snow and road closures being the norm. I would highly recommend this company, and their care and follow up, to anyone who needs products they sell.
